title: fix parsing .editorconfig line endings, add a unit test
body:
Fixes #10684 

### Context
editorconfig settings were ignored due to being incapable of parsing it if they had different line endings than the current system uses

### Changes Made
use StreamReader instead of string.Split

### Testing
unit test that file with multiple line endings is parsed correctly

### Notes
This is the fix that should go to main, a simpler fix https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10740 goes to servicing.

commit.message: fix parsing .editorconfig line endings, add a unit test
